Operation.label: Remove Duped Astra Armour
Operation.toolTip: Removes Astra versions of armour also included in this mod

enabled.xpath: Defs/ThingDef [ defName='IGStd-ArmorMk' or defName='IGStd-HelmetMk' or defName='IGStd-CaraArmorMk' or defName='IGStd-CaraHelmetMk' or defName='IG_ARM_KriegArmor' or defName='IG_ARM_KriegHelmet' ]
